about_the_game: Astalon: Tears of the Earth - Bonus Tracks is a collection of the bonus tracks from the Limited Run Games deluxe version of the Astalon: Tears of the Earth soundtrack. The first 6 tracks are music that were cut from the game, and the second 6 are additional Super Arrange versions of the game's music. We'd like to thank Limited Run Games for the team up and for releasing this music in its original form. Please enjoy!
detailed_description: Astalon: Tears of the Earth - Bonus Tracks is a collection of the bonus tracks from the Limited Run Games deluxe version of the Astalon: Tears of the Earth soundtrack. We'd like to thank Limited Run Games for the team up and for releasing this music in its original form. Please enjoy!
